snippet: FIFA barred the former Greece coach, Fernando Santos, for eight international games for verbally abusing match officials at the World Cup.
abstract: Fernando Santos, former coach of Greece's national soccer team, is barred by FIFA for eight international soccer games for unsporting conduct toward match officials at the World Cup.
lead_paragraph: FIFA barred the former Greece coach, Fernando Santos, for eight international games for verbally abusing match officials at the World Cup.

headline.main: Former Greece Coach Barred Eight Games for Conduct at World Cup
